name: Apropos IT Ventures
overview: Apropos IT Ventures is a venture capital fund dedicated to helping entrepreneurs build world-class companies. We are focused on seed and early stage companies in Israel or with strong Israeli relationships. We invest in people and their ideas. We invest in Internet Technology and Information Technology. In-depth understanding and deep knowledge of these technologies and their markets is what guides us. Building successful global companies requires a unique combination of elements - five IT elements that Apropos IT Ventures combines in its Focused Venture Capital approach. The first two focus on technology - both Information Technology and Internet Technologies. A strong technological basis on which to build.

offices.address1: Jerusalem Technology Park, Malcha Building 1, Entrance B, 1st Floor

funding_round.source_description: SeaPass Solutions completes $11.5 Million in Financing led by Dolphin Equity Partners, and the Inter Atlantic Group.
